alert.note: Alert for Fond Du Lac (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:48PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Fond du Lac County through 315 PM CDT... At 247 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fond Du Lac, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fond Du Lac, Mount Calvary, St. Cloud, Town of Forest, and Calvary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
